message: Let's divide it fairly, I'll take 60% and you'll get 40%. It's a good deal!
I think a 55/45 split is a more equitable way to start. Let's see if we can agree on this.
I'll compromise a bit, 58% for me and 42% for you. It's still a good deal considering the inflation!
I'm willing to move closer to your offer, but let's split it 52/48. It's a fair compromise considering the inflation.
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and yours. 57% for me, 43% for you. Inflation is hurting us both!
Let's just split it down the middle. We're both losing money with each round, and a 50/50 split is the fairest option at this point.
